data.title: Bitcoin Is Starting to Look Like a Digital Tulip
data.description: It’s been a tough few weeks for holders of Bitcoin. Not long ago you could, with a little effort, make a reasonable case that it was a bit like gold. Digital gold.
data.keywords: Bitcoin,Generic 1st 'GC' Future,Interest Rates,Debt,Cash Flow,Michael J Saylor,STRATEGY INC,Japan,Chief Executive Officer,C-suite,wealth,business
